title: 如何一次信号加药水等级加一
author: 吹风机客户
txt_content:
本帖最后由 吹风机客户 于 2020-7-14 09:40 编辑 

打个比方  记分版为1 力量buff  给1级  记分版为2 力量buff 2级这样子

或者给一次命令方块输出就buff+1级这样子

避免数据包 

版本1.16.1je

ps 想问一下 服务器里全部原版指令前面都要加minecraft：才能变成原版指令是插件的问题还是什么的问题  在服务器里用命令方块好不习惯

replies.author: 晴路卡
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 晴路卡 于 2020-7-14 10:01 编辑 

仔细想了下是有解决方案的
你需要的全部记分板：记录效果等级的buff，buff_0~buff_7 和 temp

scoreboard players set #2 temp 2
execute as @a run scoreboard players operation @s temp = @s buff
execute as @a run scoreboard players operation @s buff_0 = @s temp
execute as @a run scoreboard players operation @s buff_0 %= #2 temp
execute as @a run scoreboard players operation @s temp /= #2 temp
execute as @a run scoreboard players operation @s buff_1 = @s temp
execute as @a run scoreboard players operation @s buff_1 %= #2 temp
execute as @a run scoreboard players operation @s temp /= #2 temp
execute as @a run scoreboard players operation @s buff_2 = @s temp
execute as @a run scoreboard players operation @s buff_2 %= #2 temp
execute as @a run scoreboard players operation @s temp /= #2 temp
execute as @a run scoreboard players operation @s buff_3 = @s temp
execute as @a run scoreboard players operation @s buff_3 %= #2 temp
execute as @a run scoreboard players operation @s temp /= #2 temp
execute as @a run scoreboard players operation @s buff_4 = @s temp
execute as @a run scoreboard players operation @s buff_4 %= #2 temp
execute as @a run scoreboard players operation @s temp /= #2 temp
execute as @a run scoreboard players operation @s buff_5 = @s temp
execute as @a run scoreboard players operation @s buff_5 %= #2 temp
execute as @a run scoreboard players operation @s temp /= #2 temp
execute as @a run scoreboard players operation @s buff_6 = @s temp
execute as @a run scoreboard players operation @s buff_6 %= #2 temp
execute as @a run scoreboard players operation @s temp /= #2 temp
execute as @a run scoreboard players operation @s buff_7 = @s temp
execute as @a run scoreboard players operation @s buff_7 %= #2 temp
execute as @a if score @s buff_0 matches 0 run attribute @s generic.attack_damage modifier remove 0-0-0-0-0
execute as @a if score @s buff_1 matches 0 run attribute @s generic.attack_damage modifier remove 0-0-0-0-1
execute as @a if score @s buff_2 matches 0 run attribute @s generic.attack_damage modifier remove 0-0-0-0-2
execute as @a if score @s buff_3 matches 0 run attribute @s generic.attack_damage modifier remove 0-0-0-0-3
execute as @a if score @s buff_4 matches 0 run attribute @s generic.attack_damage modifier remove 0-0-0-0-4
execute as @a if score @s buff_5 matches 0 run attribute @s generic.attack_damage modifier remove 0-0-0-0-5
execute as @a if score @s buff_6 matches 0 run attribute @s generic.attack_damage modifier remove 0-0-0-0-6
execute as @a if score @s buff_7 matches 0 run attribute @s generic.attack_damage modifier remove 0-0-0-0-7
execute as @a if score @s buff_0 matches 1 run attribute @s generic.attack_damage modifier add 0-0-0-0-0 loy 3 add
execute as @a if score @s buff_1 matches 0 run attribute @s generic.attack_damage modifier add 0-0-0-0-1 loy 6 add
execute as @a if score @s buff_2 matches 0 run attribute @s generic.attack_damage modifier add 0-0-0-0-2 loy 12 add
execute as @a if score @s buff_3 matches 0 run attribute @s generic.attack_damage modifier add 0-0-0-0-3 loy 24 add
execute as @a if score @s buff_4 matches 0 run attribute @s generic.attack_damage modifier add 0-0-0-0-4 loy 48 add
execute as @a if score @s buff_5 matches 0 run attribute @s generic.attack_damage modifier add 0-0-0-0-5 loy 96 add
execute as @a if score @s buff_6 matches 0 run attribute @s generic.attack_damage modifier add 0-0-0-0-6 loy 192 add
execute as @a if score @s buff_7 matches 0 run attribute @s generic.attack_damage modifier add 0-0-0-0-7 loy 384 add复制代码在BUFF的值在0-255时都能正常工作

当然这个是直接改玩家属性而不是给药水效果
虽然还是不少 但只算命令条数的话开支是比穷举小了



命令要加minecraft应该是ess插件的问题

replies.author: 吹风机客户
replies.txt_content:
晴路卡 发表于 2020-7-14 09:36
不用数据包当然只能穷举啦
假设你记录BUFF等级的记分板名是“strength”
用数据包的话倒是有一种没有完全符 ...
穷举你也不用写这么多层吧= =    穷举还不简单

replies.author: Jokey_钥匙
replies.txt_content:
有啊 药水云
修改+tp
玩家源点和药水云重叠6t可以获得药水云效果

replies.author: 吹风机客户
replies.txt_content:
晴路卡 发表于 2020-7-14 09:36
仔细想了下是有解决方案的
你需要的全部记分板：记录效果等级的buff，buff_0~buff_7 和 temp
这个改属性的我倒是没想过
不过没记错玩家属性不是不能被修改的么

replies.author: 晴路卡
replies.txt_content:
吹风机客户 发表于 2020-7-14 10:14
这个改属性的我倒是没想过
不过没记错玩家属性不是不能被修改的么
1.16新增了attribute命令 可以改玩家属性了
旧版也可以通过给改玩家装备的NBT来改玩家属性

replies.author: 吹风机客户
replies.txt_content:
Jokey_钥匙 发表于 2020-7-14 10:06
有啊 药水云
修改+tp
玩家源点和药水云重叠6t可以获得药水云效果
药水云给的buff不是固定的？  和我的要求有什么关系吗？

replies.txt_content:

嗷 还没研究attribute  没见到有讲解贴啊

replies.author: Jokey_钥匙
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 Jokey_钥匙 于 2020-7-15 12:36 编辑 
吹风机客户 发表于 2020-7-14 10:16
药水云给的buff不是固定的？  和我的要求有什么关系吗？
不是固定的你不能改？execute store修改药水云的buff等级不就完事了？
